articles.author: Gloria Li, Stephen Morris, Peter Campbell
articles.title: Tesla and BYD sales fall as concerns mount over electric shift - Financial Times
articles.description: Group manages to reclaim crown as world’s largest seller of battery electric cars after BYD suffers big drop in shipments
articles.content:
Elon Musks Tesla and Chinese rival BYD both reported sharp falls in electric car sales, adding to concerns of the slowing shift towards electric vehicles.
Both companies the worlds top two sellers o… [+2609 chars]

articles.title: AI revolution will be boon for natural gas, say fossil fuel bosses - Financial Times
articles.description: Data centres’ need for reliable power supply set to soar
articles.content:
A surge in demand for electricity to feed data centres and to power an artificial intelligence revolution will usher in a golden era for natural gas, producers say.
